head_office_address: Queen Annes Gate, 46 St James Park
eu_initiatives: IACCSEA have an interest in the incorporation of marine pollution into the European Air Quality agenda. Specifically we are interested in the potential development of Nitrogen Emission Control Areas (NECAs) in European waters - or inclusion of marine pollution within NECD limits - specifically for NOx
organisation_name: International Association for the Catalytic Control of Ship Emissions to Air (IACCSEA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
industry_forums: We are involved in the European Sustainable Shipping Forum (ESSF)
